meanings.definition: Not able to be used or accessed.
meanings.sent1: The broken phone was unusable for making calls.
meanings.sent2: The wet paper became unusable after being left in the rain.
meanings.sent3: The melted ice cream was so unusable that even the ants avoided it.
meanings.sent4: Her old laptop was unusable, like a rusty bicycle left out in the rain.
meanings.sent5: The faded map was so unusable that it might as well have been written in a secret code.

meanings.sent1: The expired milk was unusable for baking a cake.
meanings.sent2: The dull knife was unusable for cutting vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The broken umbrella was so unusable that it turned inside out with the slightest breeze.
meanings.sent4: His unreliable car was unusable, like a horse with three legs.
meanings.sent5: The cracked mirror was so unusable that it distorted her reflection beyond recognition.
